page.topic: How to Customize Tabs in Alpha-based Web Themes
page.description: The base styling for tabs in the built-in Alpha-based Web Themes use font colors to indicate if a tab is selected, hovered, or disabled. This look can be customized to add borders, backgrounds, and animations to tabs when the user interacts with them.

discussion.p: Built-in Web Themes can be modified and extended to create unique look and feel that sets your app apart from the rest of the competition. Tabs are frequently used in web interfaces for multi-page applications. In this how to article, we'll show you how to customize tabs in the Alpha Web Theme to add borders, backgrounds, or animations.
The techniques used here can be leveraged to customize other controls and components in the Alpha Theme.

description.p: Out-of-the box, tabs in the Alpha theme have no borders.
